name: Lastline
description: This app supports executing investigative actions like 'detonate file' and 'detonate url' to analyze executables and URLs on the online Lastline sandbox.

actions.description: Run the file in the Lastline sandbox and retrieve the analysis results.
actions.verbose: This action requires the input file to be present in the vault and therefore takes the vault id as the input parameter

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to detonate

file_name.verbose: This value will be passed to the sandbox as the name of the file that is pickup up from the vault

actions.description: Query for results of an already completed task in Lastline.

id.description: Task ID to get the results of

actions.description: Load a URL in the Lastline sandbox and retrieve the analysis results.
This action connects to the server to verify the connection.
